item.title: A pothole in road problem, 5th January
item.description:
email rec 03/01/2024 - To whom it may concern, Please find attached a letter detailing a road incident on the 11th August 2023. I have also hand delivered a hard copy, today. Yours faithfully,
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain on roundabout blocked causing large amounts of standing water, 5th January
item.description:
Despite having the gully cleaned several times and recent works on the adjacent drainage in July 2021, the drain on the roundabout remains blocked causing a large volume of standing water to collect on the roundabout. This in turn means that many pedestrians get soaked by cars going through this water long after the rain has ceased
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): B4075, Battledown, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 12inch to 15inch wide 5cm deep pothole in middle of the road. Difficult to spot when full of water after heavy rain. Frequently hit by cars turning into or out of Sandford Park Place., 5th January
item.description:
At the entrance to Sandford Park Place, in the middle of the road, next to a recent repair. Pothole started to form in the summer and has been gradually getting deeper.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Sandford Park Place, Tivoli, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Persistent problem with e-scooters being dumped, 5th January
item.description:
E-scooters are persistently being dumped on the corner of leckhampton road and treelands avenue GL53 0BX 5 or 6 are outside every day and they should be picked up regularly. old people live in the area and mothers with buggies - they are a nuisance and a trip hazard. Voi's reporting process is difficult for oldies if not got a smart phone and they have been unresponsive on phoning
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 120, Leckhampton Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain blocked, 5th January
item.description:
The drain outside number 11,15,and17 on Gretton Road is blocked and now the water is coming up through the pavment with the heavy rain and is getting worse by the day ,the pavment has been taken up and has not been repaired as this problem needs sorting its been about 5yrs and has not been investigated properly

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gretton Road, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
